verses.name: Psalms 77:6
verses.text: I call to remembrance my song in the night: I commune with mine own heart: and my spirit made diligent search.

verses.name: Psalms 77:7
verses.text: Will the Lord cast off for ever? and will he be favourable no more?

verses.name: Psalms 77:8
verses.text: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore?

verses.name: Psalms 77:9
verses.text: Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 77:10
verses.text: And I said, This is my infirmity: but I will remember the years of the right hand of the most High.
